description: Impacts from up to 6 possible air pollutants of companies on health, agricultural productivity, and other impacts.
Impacts on land occupied or converted by a company, covering the loss of ecosystem services in different locations and for different land use types.

Impacts from the mass of waste generated and disposed of by various methods (such as incineration and waste to landfill), including impacts on leachate, disamenity, climate change and air pollution.
Impacts from 104 possible corporate water pollutants on human health and eutrophication.
